website_summaries.verdict: This option gets high marks for both its sound and the quality of its included accessories kit.
pros: Has a smooth sound and nice resonance
Strings are soft, smooth, and easy to tune
Accessories kit includes strings, picks, a tuner, strap, and case
cons: Some buyers report durability issues with the pegs, strings, and other parts of this ukulele

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ukulele! For the money, it cannot be beat! It exceeded my expectations and this is a fantastic ukulele to get started on, or be your second uke!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Allen

customer_reviews.title: Smooth sound, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed there weren't that many reviews here--and most of them were for grandmothers buying for children. I am a 25 year old beginner and I adore the sound and clarity of this uke. The build quality is terrific and I love the accessories as well! The tuner is great and so is the case!! And all for $52--sold!!!
customer_reviews.author: Our Time

customer_reviews.title: Lovely instrument
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting to learn the ukulele and this one is the perfect size for me. I tried a soprano ukelel but it just didn't feel right for Mr. The sound on the Donner is clear and sharp. I can't wait to actually play a tune!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Ukulele! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time playing the ukelele, and I caught on very quickly and I’ve learn a lot of songs. It was worth every penny I spent, this is a keep safe. It’s good craftsmanship, easy to tune, and sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rita-Mariah

customer_reviews.title: We got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Our music teacher recommended we order this specific ukulele, but something was off with the one we received. I know new ukuleles need to be tuned regularly, but the one we received needed to be tuned constantly. As soon as I would finish tuning each chord the rest would already be out of tune and I would have to start over again. I ordered a new ukulele (different brand) and it has been a total breeze.
customer_reviews.author: BeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Once bitten, twice shy
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I'm going to comment on two things. First, the sound. The sound on this Ukulele is AMAZING. Truly the best sound. The reason why I gave it only 3 stars is within a few months, the bridge snapped off. It happened while it was in the padded case, so no one was hurt, but those things are difficult to glue back on. Because of the bridge coming unglued, this AMAZING ukulele only got 3 stars. I have not contacted the seller to return it, as it happened a few months after I bought it. I have since glued it, but I'm super scared to play it in case it snaps off again.
customer_reviews.author: The Jenkster

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive uke
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tenor version, and I am well pleased. A couple of weeks ago, I got a crash course in guitar making at the C.F. Martin factory. I was not ready to spring for a $700 instrument that I may or may not be able to learn, so I got a Donner for a tenth the price. The construction is excellent. I do touch up the tuning every time I pick it up, but it requires less each time. Being larger, it is easier for me to play. The votes are not all in on whether I will actually be able to learn, but I am having fun so far.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Scott

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: absolutely gorgeous ukelele, but the strings won’t stay tuned long enough to even strum a chord. all the strings are loose, but especially the E string. even tried tightening the knobs and it still didn’t work. this was the second ukelele this happened to me with after purchasing from two different brands on amazon. please just save your time and don’t buy musical instruments on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Awesome game

customer_reviews.title: LOOKING FOR A UKULELE - THIS IS IT <-------
customer_reviews.text: This is one sweet deal. It doesn't matter if you're a beginner or an experienced player. This comes with it all, tuner, bag, extra strings, strap and of course a very nice easy playing ukulele. It takes awhile for the strings to stretch (about a week) then tune and play. I'm not being paid for this review. I read another review on this and decided to give it a whirl. For the money, you cannot beat this deal.
customer_reviews.author: alj

customer_reviews.title: So bad..
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Impossible for this ukulele to keep its tune for more than 20 mins. Completely unworthy, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners only
customer_reviews.text: ....this is a pretty good uke for someone who is a beginner and just learning. I have a couple higher quality ukes so it is unfair for me to judge the Donner by that standard. I bought it thinking I might luck out and get a pretty good uke for the price but you definitely get what you pay for. I do love the strap - it was the first time I used one and it felt great, very comfy when I played. If you already have a uke that you have spent at least $100 on, do not buy this one unless you want to give it away to a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful instrument! Very sturdy, well made, high-quality!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter absolutely LOVES this ukelele! She's been wanting one for a while, and after researching so many of them, we decided on this one. So glad we did! This is a beautiful instrument! Very sturdy, well made, high-quality! It has a beautiful tone, and seems to stay in tune. The wood is beautiful, too. The case that comes with it is well made, protective, and has a nice large storage area. It also comes with extra strings, a decent strap, and a tuner that works great. We bought this along with the Essential Elements for ukelele book for our daughter, and she was able to teach herself and can now play pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: HummingbirdsTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Decent beginner Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start by saying that I got one of those “warehouse specials” $10 off original price. The good: Wood looks beautiful, neck is comfortable and smooth, sounds like a Ukulele, stays in tune once the strings are stretched. The bad: Came with no strap buttons! (See pic) Fingerboard and bridge were dried as a bone. Fret ends are sharp. Stain was missed in a spot by the bridge (but not very noticeable). Bottom line, I kept it. For the price this is a decent beginner Ukulele. I can fix most of the things mentioned above with very little money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a newbie
customer_reviews.text: Having never played a string instrument before, I was happy to see that this product included everything I would need. Ukulele, case, digital tuner, extra strings, and carrying straps. It took a while to tune the first time because it came with strings on but barely tight. One string popped off during this; it seems like they just have a knot at the end and it slipped off under pressure. I tied a figure eight that won't slip and it's stayed on fine since. I've been learning a few songs but need to find some better sources! It's no fun to play 4 chords repeating since I'm not much of a singer... I would highly recommend this though!
customer_reviews.author: Andy G

customer_reviews.title: Wider neck with 38mm nut
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ukulele. This one has a wider neck and a nut width of 38mm. suitable for those with big fingers. Easy for finger picking. Nut width is the only reason I bought this ukulele. Sound is not great right out of the box. But Once the string is settled, sound is fine. I wish this one had a radius fretboard..!
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderdul addition to my stockpile of strInged instruments. The set is wonderdul especially for a beginner without several of the items included (strap, gig case, picks, strings, tuner etc). The strings are easy on the fingertips and the sound is warm and full. Great little product for the price. I ended up personalizing it with a vinyl fox decal and now I love it even more. The ONLY caviat I have is how often I have to retune it. I can get through a five minute riff before the strings begin to go a wee bit flat. Not a big deal though. Isn't terrible just noticable to a trained ear.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Downin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fair price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my uke. It sounds good, stays in tune, is easy to play and is beautiful. I'm a beginner, but more experienced players have told me it's good for the price. The bigger body of the tenor uke has a richer sound than the tiny sopranos. And I think the tiny ones look silly on a bigger person. This tenor is just right. And I love that it came with a tuner and case. (The strap is useless. Who uses a strap with a uke?)
customer_reviews.author: Andy Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value
customer_reviews.text: This is a prime example of a tenor ukelele. My daughter wanted a tenor ukelele as a step up from her soprano. I don't see how you can beat the value and quality of this instrument. It's solid, sounds great, and it looks like it cost far more than it does. I don't see how you can go wrong here, especially with the extras. This is not a toy ukelele, but a solid and great-sounding instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Weezie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner ukulele
customer_reviews.text: A month into buying my ukulele and i am so glad I did.. Learning how to play has kept me entertained and sane during this lock down. Ive never used one before buying this one but I feel like this product sounds very good, it is well made, sturdy and comes with everything you need to start learning.
customer_reviews.author: jasmin luna

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say other than this is a quality product. Feels great in my hands, sounds great. A great kit. Compared it to the Kmise of similar price. Kmise was nice, but the fret ends were very rough and support said it's normal. Not a problem on the Donner. Maybe higher quality control. I would say for a young child go for something like the FUYXAN plastic ukelele - got one for my 4yo son and it sounds fantastic and he can't break it (easily).
customer_reviews.author: rLogix

customer_reviews.title: Great Uke
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little start ukulele. I played it exclusively for about a year before buying something more expensive. This Donner uke stays at work so I can play on breaks and lunch. It has really incredibly good sound for such an inexpensive uke. I love it and I'd recommend it for a beginner or anyone who needs a portable ukulele. Mine shows no wear and tear and looks brand new. I've changed strings once in a year's time of daily playing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kuehnel

customer_reviews.title: Good first uke
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape. Tuned up well with included tuner. Had it for awhile now and did my first string change - I used more expensive strings but didn't hear much difference. It isn't as attractive as I thought it was in pictures but it does seem well put together. I've been watching YouTube videos and can confirm there are tons of beginner guides that can get you playing songs within a few days. At some point I'll probably upgrade to something I find more visually attractive but not in a rush. I played some more expensive ukes and didn't hear enough of a difference to justify spending much more money.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Solid ukulele with pretty good sound
customer_reviews.text: Solid ukulele with pretty good sound. A string snapped within the first 20 minutes but was easy to fix. Haven't used the case as it hangs on the wall but the case looks good quality. Overall I really like the ukulele and have played it a lot. May end up switch out the strings but they still sound good. After a few days they stay in tune pretty well. Was my first ukulele and I did not want to spend too much in case I did not like it, but also did not want a toy. This is very good quality for the price. It is on a lot of top 10 lists for beginner ukuleles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect Ukulele to learn on
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these ukuleles for my daughter, then I bought another one for myself. It is a great starter ukulele and easy to play. Much better sound quality than you would expect at this price. The case is roomy enough so the ukulele isn't cramped and the front pocket is perfect for all the extras you get with the ukulele. Tuning is easy with the provided tuner. There are a lot of instructional lessons on the internet, so give it a try. The size of this Concert Ukulele makes it easier to play than the Soprano sized Ukulele. I highly recommend the Donner Concert Ukulele to anyone interested in learning to play a fun instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Marticci

customer_reviews.title: Great ukelele with all you need to start and a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality! If you compare with some other starter ukuleles, the tuners on this brand are nice and pretty smooth compared to another ukulele that I bought at a local music store on sale. It was only the ukelele for that store. This is the ukelele, bag, tuning device and some other tidbits. Oh, if I only came here first! The reviews from this really got my attention and my other daughter wanted a ukelele too. Tada!
customer_reviews.author: rebIT

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, probably.
customer_reviews.text: These things go straight from manufacturing to Amazon then to your door. There is no dealer to check the quality. I received one of these and it was not sanded down well and had sharp fret ends. Not cool. I had Amazon replace it and it was great! So, hopefully, you will get a goof one. Other than that issue, this is a very good ukulele. I recommend it. It sounds great and for the price, you get a lot of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked me for a Luna brand ukulele for Christmas at a whopping $200. Unsure of whether she would actually stick to it, I decided on this one after reading ALOT of reviews. She loves it. It sounds great and as I sit here in my living room 15 days later, I’m listening to her play Jason Mraz on the deck outside. She takes it everywhere with her.
customer_reviews.author: Mikamax

customer_reviews.title: Love this ukulele !
customer_reviews.text: I love This ukulele! I’m an advanced beginner and it’s fine ! I even Took it to a music store and both them and my music teacher said it’s fine ! The music store in my neighborhood doesn’t need my money. She plays the guitar herself and said it was awesome for a beginner ! I might eventually upgrade to a better one. But if you are playing for fun and for a hobby this is perfect. Comes with a great case, and a tuner also ! Enjoy !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Value for the Price.  My 12 Year Old Won’t Put It Down.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son saved up for this ukulele. He taught himself to play from YouTube videos. He carries it with him, he shows me daily the new cords or songs he has learned. I can’t believe how motivated he has stayed with this ukulele. It sounds good and came with everything accessory wise that he needed. I had my doubts for the price but now that we’ve had it, I couldn’t be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner ukulele!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's ukulele class that she will be starting. It looks good with a slightly bowed back and has a good traditional sound. It does seem like I constantly have to retune it but that is probably more the fault of nylon strings. The bag is perfect for her to take to school and the tuner is a little finicky but does the job. Overall I'm satisfied with the purchase and it is pretty easy to learn instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Pam & Corey Tice

customer_reviews.title: Good starter Ukelele for beginners during quarantine
customer_reviews.text: I got this ukelele during quarantine and it's a great starter to string instruments. The ukelele is decently made. The strings have a good feel and tuner helps to get you started right away. One of the tuning pegs is a little loose and seems to require tuning more often. This comes with several picks of different sizes and a nice carring bag and strap. Overall I would recommend for anyone wanting to start out and play right away.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have two other brands of ukulele (Flight & Makala), both of which are similar in price. This Donner uke is lovely - plays like a dream, well made, and this one comes with so many accessories! I love the strap (it has a built-in peg button on the bottom but the top part ties to the neck), although I wish I'd had a choice in colors since it's orange and not my fav, but well made. Comes with an easy to use tuner, tunes nicely and after a few times of playing/tuning it's holding the tune longer. Great instrument for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner Uke for practicing!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find a new musical hobby and I figured that something cheap and easy like a Uke would be perfect. The set comes with everything you need to get started, the Uke itself is very good quality and made from real wood and has a good finish to it. The case it comes in protects the Uke well and holds all the accessories like your Tuner and picks etc. The included strap also is decent quality and the Intro guides even included some beginner songs and how to tune your Uke. I think for how cheap this item was, its a great buy for any beginner who wants to get into Uke.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first ukulele, I have several. I purchased this one so I would have the same size one at home as at school. The 3rd string will not tune. The 3rd string tuner just keeps spinning and getting no where. I'm sure I could take it apart and restring it but this is frustrating, I shouldn't have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Kids Inc. Pediatrics

customer_reviews.title: Great starter instrument
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful instrument. Purchased for my middle school homeschooler taking a co-op class this year. The ukulele recommended by the teacher had a long shipping time, so I took a chance on this one and we are so pleased. It looks beautiful, the sound is great, and it's easy for my child to play. All the extras that came with it are so helpful, and has a nice case. We recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: tallmomma

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding instrument half decent fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: I got this as my first ukulele. i am pretty impressed with the sound of it after putting on some better strings. the fit and finish are just ok, the rosette around the sound hole looks like a water slide decal that was not applied correctly in a spot or two and if you look in side you can see globs of glue that were used during construction. the tuning knobs hold nicely and the included tuner works well. good instrument and accessories for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Micah S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ukulele for my daughter for her birthday. Her first ukulele was pretty poor quality and falling apart. She absolutely loves this one. She says she needs to tune it more frequently than she would like. But it has great sound quality and is easy to play. And the price wasn’t astronomical. If she plays this one until it falls apart I would be comfortable buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelb

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I decided that one of my new coping mechanisms for anxiety (and for making the time to faster during my husbands upcoming deployment) would be to teach myself (Aka learn by watching YouTube tutorials) the ukulele. After reading and watching a ton of reviews, I decided on this one and I’m so glad I did. The ukulele itself is gorgeous and the carrying case is extremely practical well put together. With the help of a quick YouTube video, I had the ukulele tuned using the included tuner in about 5 minutes. I would definite recommend this brand to anyone looking to purchase one!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K.

customer_reviews.title: Fantabulous First Uke
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a good way to put my toes in the water without breaking the bank. I was amazed at how quickly i learned to play and how great this uke sounds. This is my new favorite hobby; I play every day after work to relax. Great quality materials, strings sound good, tuner is good - you really can't ask for a better beginner kit. Much higher quality than what I expected! I bought the concert; about to buy a soprano to go with it. Can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ukulele as a present for a ten year old. She wanted to learn to play and it seemed to be a good choice based on the specifications and price. I was not disappointed. The ukulele seems to be very well made and the sound is quite good. This young lady is taking lessons from her father and generally I think that the ease in learning to play any instrument depends on the time and effort that is out into it. But, having said that I do believe it is easier than starting with a guitar.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great ukulele bundle for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: My husband asked for a ukulele for Christmas. He didn't want the smallest size but wanted one that still had the traditional ukulele sound and this concert ukulele was perfect. He was very happy that it came with a tuner, picks, and everything he needed. At first, one string kept going out of tune, but I think maybe it just took some time with him playing it for it to finally work itself out...maybe it had to stretch or something? He said the chords are much easier to learn than a guitar and he already learned several songs the first day he got it. He's played it quite a bit and is really enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Ukele I have bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I have four Ukeleles from Amazon and this one is by far the best one I have bought. The kit was actually a kit and comes with a proper nice case, a tuner, and a strap for the ukelele. The ukelele itself has mounting points for the strap, something the other brands I have do not. The tuning heads are of very nice quality and use all metal spacers instead of vibrating plastic parts on some of the others such as my Makala Kala tener ukelele has. I like the SNARK tuner better than the one that came with this kit but this one has more features to tune guitar, violin, etc that could be useful for someone.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice Uke!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one of these for me and my daughter to learn on. Unfortunately it didn’t come with the starter kit that it was supposed to, we needed the tuner to tune the Uke. , Amazon took good care of us with a new uke and kit at no charge. It has turned out to be a nice Uke and we are having a good time learning. It appears to me to be a good quality Uke for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Concert Size, Hardwood Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound on this concert sized ukulele. Made from magnolia hardwood which contributes to the mellow sound. Comes with digital tuner, nylon replacement strings, decorative strap, and several colorful picks. My intention was to find a ukulele of hardwood construction which was not made in China; however, it turns out that most ukuleles are made in China these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner ukulele! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to get this in the mail! It arrived quickly and when I opened it up , it was even fancier than I expected! It included a very nice carrying case and Strap, it also came with an extra string and a tuner. I have been practicing on this everyday and I haven’t had to change a string yet. It sounds great, but it does need to be tuned frequently. I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great uke, AMAZING value!
customer_reviews.text: This "budget" uke blew me away! The only ukes available locally at this price are from a guitar chain, and they're plastic... This uke OBVIOUSLY blows those outta the water, and it sounds great, but where this lil uke REALLY shines, are the details; The finish is a BEAUTIFUL satin over mahogany that has an almost 3D effect under multiple light sources, it's just gorgeous... The inlay around the sound hole is a nice touch, but my favorite has to be the SEE THROUGH tuners! I've never saw that before... All in all, a great sounding and playing ukele, at an AMAZING value...
customer_reviews.author: Christian Key

customer_reviews.title: Great little ukulele!
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele was the perfect one for thus beginner. It comes with everything you would need to get going and the quality seems exceptional for the price. It is easy to tune with the included tuner and nice that it comes with the case. I haven’t had as much time to spend learning how to play it as I had hoped but am fitting some online lessons in when I can and enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: kederkitty

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Ukulele Kit
customer_reviews.text: Good Starter Ukulele, love the extras. The feel of this ukulele is a little heftier than others- the neck a little larger- but so far, it’s been a great learning instrument. The sound quality is good, even excellent for the price, but we’re talking about a $70 instrument here, so we’re not at professional level. Love having the strap- an addition I didn’t anticipate using but has proved invaluable. The tuner is subpar, but helpful in a pinch. All in all, pretty great deal if you’re just starting out
customer_reviews.author: Franimal

customer_reviews.title: Warm sound, good price, happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Donner Concert Ukulele and accessories are a good purchase for the price. Strings retain tuning after a few days and the sound is fairly resonant for an instrument of this size, price and quality. Accessories (tuner, strap and strings) are a generous inclusion. Had some email interchange with marketer because accessories didn't arrive with the Ukulele. They were were probably out of stock and had to be shipped separately from China. This took several weeks. However, Donner customer service saw to my eventually getting them and were very courteous and prompt about it.
customer_reviews.author: Musicista

customer_reviews.title: Most everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Especially for an entry level instrument, it has nice, filed down fret bars, nice fret markers in both locations. Geared tuners, strap buttons. The "gig bag" is quite nice as well. The little front pocket is roomy. The tune is holding well, and the instrument has a nice sound. I highly recommend this package with the tuner and abundant accessories.
customer_reviews.author: suzyq

customer_reviews.title: Great Uke, Great Inspiration to Learn to Play
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if I'll be able to master the uke — but if I don't, it won't be on account of this beautiful instrument. It is a really well made uke, feels really rich and well made. The other included bonuses - case, strings, picks, tuner - are great additions. The instructions on the tuner are a little small in print and hard to decipher at first glance — but definitely "crackable!" This kind of quality delivery has me really encouraged to do more than just strum and store — thanks for the inspiration to really make something of this!
customer_reviews.author: D.G. Chichester

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound is so beautiful and chords are easy to play. Instrument came totally set up and required only minor tuning, which is good. Seller had wonderful communication and instrument arrived promptly and in perfect condition. I love how it sounds, how it's made and what it comes with! I love this ukulele. Absolutely wonderful for the money!
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Well Made...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 12 year old grandson. He plays the ukulele at school for music class and wanted one to use at home. This ukulele is little larger than the one he uses at school, but he says it's the perfect size. Well made!,...Took a few tunings before it kept it's tune...My grandson loves it....PLAYS it all the time sounds awesome....
customer_reviews.author: carleen turner

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built
customer_reviews.text: This is my fist music instrument ever I purchased. Due to the stay at home order I wanted to try something new and decided to buy this This is one of the best decision I took. This instrument is for first timers. I am satisfied with it. With it a week i was able to learn how to play it. The instrument is well made and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: naga raghuveer modala

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little ukulele for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little ukulele for the price. Full tone and relatively easy on the fingers. I found that I get a fuller tone when tuning in G, not A as is the standard practice. Just my personal preference. It comes with a nice little clip-on tuner that is very handy. And with a nice bag, it is really a good buy. This is my third ukulele. It is cheaper than the first two, and has a better sound.
customer_reviews.author: holly 03

customer_reviews.title: Perfect package for beginners, great ukulele for all!
customer_reviews.text: This tenor ukulele bundle is perfect for anyone who would like to learn to the ukulele. Comes with everything you need to get started, right out of the box. There are tons of videos on YouTube. Check out Bernadette’s 30 day ukulele challenge, great for beginners and very helpful. I will buy this brand again when I want a soprano or concert ukulele.
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: Best ukulele in this price range.
customer_reviews.text: I am a music teacher and I used to work in a music store. I have tested out and bought a lot of ukuleles for students. This is the best sounding budget ukulele I have ever come across. Usually you have to spend over $100-$150 to get a ukulele this good. If you are a beginning this is a good place to start. If you are advanced this is a really nice banger that you don’t have to worry about breaking or loosing.
customer_reviews.author: Interceptor

customer_reviews.title: If you're not sure, read below!
customer_reviews.text: I need to apologize to Donner ... why did I ever buy my concert-size uke from Hola!? This soprano instrument from Donner is just fabulous! The finish quality is so much better, as is the carry bag, and the accessories. Next time I need a starter uke for anyone, either for myself or to give as a gift, I will run, not walk, toward a Donner!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Early Christmas Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Loved the great reviews of this ukulele and were excited to buy it for our daughter! We gave it to her as an early Christmas gift in hope of her being able to bring it with us on vacation after Christmas. She opened it and it will not stay tuned, so frustrating! She tried for over an hour, it would ahow that it was in tune, then it went right back out of tune. We are giving it another shot and will be replacing it for the same exact thing, fingers crossed that the next one will actually stay tuned. Otherwise, we’ll continue to shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary K Jean

customer_reviews.title: sweet sounding, comfortable to play uke!
customer_reviews.text: great beginner uke, .I come from the islands so I know ukes...this is a good uke for the money..i bought it for my kid and its more than good enough for a beginner ..its a great uke to take around with you to the beach and stuff like that..i wouldn't use it for professional use..but I would buy it again.....only critique on the craftsmanship is it has slight fret buzz cuz the string action is so low...but thats not a major problem...other than that a great feeling ,comfortable to play, nice sounding uke.
customer_reviews.author: Josh simpliciano

customer_reviews.title: Great little Uke!
customer_reviews.text: My father recently started playing and this little uke is perfect fro him! He enjoys it very much and plays its many times weekly! I would recommend this package because it has everything you need to start out playing. It comes with a tuner 2 pairs of strings a variety of guitar picks a strap and a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: BayAreaBoss41510

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great beginners ukulele! I'm nearly an expert player and wanted to buy one for my little sister to teach her, but I didn't want her to learn on my $700 one. I was expecting to have to switch out the strings and whatnot, but everything is up to par. It doesn't stay tuned for very long, but that's a given with these. She needs to learn how to tune her own uke anyway. The bag and strap are great quality as well! Would highly recommend for a beginner!
customer_reviews.author: Scythe

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son on his seventh birthday. He loves it because it's "real," instead of a toy. The only downside I've found is that the peg mounted to hold the strap for your neck allows the uke to be played only by the right hand. My son is a leftie. So, the strap is attached at the bottom of the neck and he deals with it. Great uke!
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Fryer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ukulele for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Larger than a Soprano so easier to learn on. It has a beautifully rich ukulele sound and feels like a well made instrument. The bag and accessories it came with are very nice. As an experienced beginner this is a great ukulele to learn on or add to your collection for new or experienced players.
customer_reviews.author: steffany813

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product !!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this ukulele is beyond expectations!! The sound quality is fantastic. The strap Is affixed securely-everything about this is great!! This was ordered after receiving 2 defective products of a different manufacturer-this was well worth the slight price increase. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sandra bakdwin

customer_reviews.title: We are winning that talent show.
customer_reviews.text: Great beginners ukulele. I bought it to play songs with my son. He just turned 1 and doesn't really get how to play it yet, but it's so easy. He should be able to learn a few songs by the end of the week. Just in time for the big talent show. The washers on the tuner pegs were rattling, but the nuts were easily tightened. No more rattling
customer_reviews.author: Bunko Artist

customer_reviews.title: Best made option for beginners - tried several
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several different widely reviewed ukes off Amazon and this was by far the best. Smooth frets, well made. The one thing that really sucked was one of them had a string that buzzed which drove me nuts but I got a different one that didn't have that problem. You will be very happy with this uke.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking for gift giving
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift, so my review is based on appearance and recipient reaction. We looked at several similar brands and chose this one because it has the best carrying case of any offered on amazon. It also comes with nicer extras than most and the mahogany version is really nice looking. The gift recipient loved it and got it all out and started playing immediately. Everything fit in the case, which seemed well made. We were definitely happy choosing this set.
customer_reviews.author: Dwide Schrude

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound. Metal frets weren't cut cleanly though.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful uke. The sound is so warm. Really love it. My only problem, is that the metal frets were a little sharp on the edges. When you looked closely, they weren't cut cleanly, leaving sharp metal points on most of them. I've been able to pick them away, even sanded a few down. It is ok now. Still sometimes catches on my fingers slightly. I assume it will wear down with time, but still felt a little sloppy of craftsmanship. But I would still recommend based on the everything else and the quality of the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kimpossible

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had so much fun with my ukulele! I decided to teach myself to play during this pandemic, and I’m so glad I did! It’s addicting because it’s so easy to learn! I have a musical background so figuring out songs to play with the 3 basic chords has been fun, but anyone can play this instrument! I read a lot of reviews before my purchase, so I went in with my eyes open about the need to tune the uke often, which has been very true. The tuner that comes with it has been very helpful. One of my most enjoyable purchases ever! If you’re on the fence about it, just do it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was great for a few months
customer_reviews.text: This was the second ukulele I bought to get my son started in learning music. I was thrilled at first. It stayed in tune, it sounded beautiful and was easy to handle. However, a few months in, it doesn't stay in tune. And I don't mean after a few days... I mean I play one chord on it and the next one is out of tune. I'm very disappointed for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. This instrument comes with a bunch of accessories that are very useful. It comes with picks, a strap, extra strings, a cleaning cloth, a good little tuner and a carrying case. It had great sound and looks really sharp too. Donner had really outdone themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Van A

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my significant other. I’ve purchased two other ukuleles as gifts (for nieces) and this is by far the best one. Definitely pays to pay a little more than $40. It’s great for a beginner and not too much of an investment if they decide it’s not for them. Also nice enough to provide a great experience for a beginner. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This little ukulele is fabulous! The quality is even better than I expected. It’s the perfect ukulele for beginners. I like that it came with a strap and tuner. Those have really come in handy. I highly recommend this and will be getting one for my daughter so we can both play the ukulele together.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndee

customer_reviews.title: Good product with all necessary accy
customer_reviews.text: If you are a beginner like me, who is not sure if they can concur Ukelele or not, this is a good product with all necessary accy, and you can go directly. However, the sound is nor THAT pretty and clear, and one sting is easy to get offtune and you need always adjust it. I have no complaint at all. I got what I paid for :)
customer_reviews.author: Hazel G

customer_reviews.title: Great Instrument
customer_reviews.text: Was in a Ukelele band in grade school many decades ago and thought it would be fun to try it again! This is a well crafted, nice looking instrument that produces a good sound. Tuning is an issue for the first week or so but there are numerous online apps to assist so no need for the tuner. Great fun and my 17 year old daughter thinks it is cool and has an interest in learning as well. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Godorov

customer_reviews.title: Really good for anyone that wants to get into playing the ukulele
customer_reviews.text: First Ukulele I’ve ever bought. Got it for my wife and I to just noodle around with and learn. I rated this the way that I did because it’s been a really good so far. It seems to be pretty sturdy and the neck hasn’t bowed or anything. We do have to tune it frequently but I’m pretty certain that’s just the nature of the nylon strings. Overall, I’d recommend this product for anyone looking to learn this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A. Sun

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect beginner instrument!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a beginner or new trial of an instrument. Gave it as a gift to my niece who immediately pulled up a ukulele app on her phone and was able to match the initial and subsequent tuning to her phone. Very happy with the included case and accessories for the price. Listed in top 10 brands of all ukuleles thru Google too. Niece very happy, druving my own happiness.
customer_reviews.author: Bash

customer_reviews.title: I am LITERALLY IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This ukelele set was everything I could possibly look for! The ukelele itself is absolutely gorgeous. Beautiful mahogany wood and the perfect color. Sound is crisp and with proper tuning, it sounds great. It is lightweight and the perfect size as well. The item comes with a protective case that conveniently has back straps for easy carrying. It also has a set of picks, a cute strap for the ukelele itself, a micro fiber cloth and even a tuner! I am very happy with this set! I am a beginner so this set had everything I needed to get started. I am so excited to learn how to play for future camping trips!
customer_reviews.author: Mai Han

customer_reviews.title: Great little ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching different ukulele's to buy. I chose this one because of recommended sound, quality and price. It came with a few goodies and soft cover case. This little instrument did not disappoint. I am a total beginner and have been teaching myself, looking at videos, etc. It is easy to get started with chords, and strumming right away. I feel like it was a great choice. The sound resonates well, strings are strong, tuner easy to use. So far, everything right with this uke!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Collins

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Starter Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I am brand new to ukulele playing and wanted to do something new during this isolating period. This uke comes with everything you would need to get started, case, picks, and most importantly a tuner. The only additional purchase I needed was a capo so I could play Jolene in tune! I do notice that the E string goes out of tune more than the rest, but otherwise I’ve been happy with its construction and the sounds it makes. An excellent place to start.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument
customer_reviews.text: First of all I don’t know much about instruments, I own a guitar and it’s the only thing I can compare the craftsmanship, which is nice not perfect but very good keeping the price in mind. Very easy to pick up it includes a case to keep it protected, only recommendation change the strings, grab some Martin strings their like 10 bucks for some “expensive” ones it makes the instruments sound a lot better. Con: Only complaint is that the paint in the neck is a little uneven but honestly that doesn’t matter and you can barely notice it, just a little pet peeve
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: This ukelele is great for beginners! The quality of the instrument it pretty good for the price. The wood is light but sturdy, smooth and well built. The sound is good, the strings that come with it are very soft and comfortable for beginner hands.
customer_reviews.author: NinjahGirl

customer_reviews.title: My first ukulele and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this ukulele in January and I think for being a beginner is a great deal and it sounds perfect . Although I think after few months of using it it started to sound a little different . I don't know if o should change the strings already . Anyways I love it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ukulele value
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele came with everything a person needs to tune and care for your ukulele. The quality seems good. I bought this for my 13-year-old daughter. She was Able to tune it herself. It’s a lot of fun to listen to her strumming away. The value was good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding instrument!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful instrument! I ordered this during prime days on a whim, and I am so happy I did. The sound is crystal clear straight out of the box (with lots of tuning) which surprised me because I typically replace the strings on new instruments with better ones straight away. The kit included a nice gig bag, a tuner, replacement strings, and a neck strap. All of the accoutrement was great quality as well. Basically, if you're on the fence about purchasing this, I say go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Sierratofu

customer_reviews.title: Very handsome ukulele
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful ukulele for a beginner. It's nice that it comes with a carrying case, three really pretty picks, extra strings and another attractive strap for the ukulele itself. I paid extra for the extra secure packaging and don't regret it, but the ukulele comes in a shaped box that is pretty sturdy. Very happy with this and am looking forward to playing it often!
customer_reviews.author: percenturynine

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice  for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have actually ordered three different Donner Ukulele's--some in different sizes. And they've all been great. They come with a case, a tuner and an easy to put on strap. I really like the pegs that are on the ukulele so you can attach it. Overall, this seems to be the best ukulele for the price that I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Benson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those looking around
customer_reviews.text: Everything that it came with was perfect, from the ukulele itself to the extra cords being provided. This is a perfect ukulele combination for anyone who wants to have the best of the ukulele, from having it secure in its own bag to having a tuner to make sure it is well tuned. I have no complaints for this perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: kev090

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Neck was warped and top 4 frets wouldn't play. I bought my kid this for Christmas. She was crushed when it turned out to be junk. Chinese made garbage. DO NOT BUY ONE OF THESE.
customer_reviews.author: this game is awsome it really helps you at msth i love this game

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son to learn to play, and the one thing I'm happy about is that the ukulele doesn't go out of tune a lot. I'm glad we went with this one after reading reviews on some of the others. I know if my son had to continually tune the instrument it would become frustrating for him.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Expected better!
customer_reviews.text: The overall appearance of this ukulele is quite nice. However when playing there is to much buzzing from the C string and therefore the 3 star. Will try to fix it but in all honesty I would not recommend this ukulele. I've also purchased a Lohanu ukulele which is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: ... and the reviewed raved about it and I was super excited to purchase it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Ukulele as a beginner and the reviewed raved about it and I was super excited to purchase it. This is a great ukulele however the strings are the worst. They don't hold a tune for longer than one song. I ended up purchasing other strings and it has sounded better and felt better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all wood tenor ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it as a gift. It arrived in excellent condition, and is a well made all wood ukulele. It plays as well as ukuleles costing ten times this price. Highly recommend as a beginner, or for a experienced player as well.
customer_reviews.author: ookiedukes

customer_reviews.title: Good mid-grade ukulele.
customer_reviews.text: Well made instrument. Bought it for my son for Christmas. I like that it came with a tuner and extra strings. The edges of the frets on ours were a little rough and unpolished. But otherwise it’s a great ukulele for beginner to mid-level players.
customer_reviews.author: ProDigi Tech

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed to play a song
customer_reviews.text: Total beginner here and this had everything I needed to get started. Used some YouTube videos and once I got the hang the finger patterns from chord to chord I was good. Quality of the ukelele was good but I didn’t know what to look for.
customer_reviews.author: Kalani R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this ukelele! I've played a lot of stringed instruments and was a little skeptical at the price, but it sounds great and plays well. I did have to tighten a few loose tuner nuts that were rattling a bit, but that was no biggie. Once the strings stretch, this thing stays in tune very well too. I would certainly recommend and am already thinking of buying another Donner in a different size, probably tenor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Klaas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and arrived safely
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 12yo daughter and it’s great. The strings that came with it are fine. We know it takes a little time (about 2 weeks) for ukulele stings to stretch but we were able to play most the day with minimal tuning. Easy to play. Great quality. Arrived safely and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie LeFever

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounds, good price, new hobby.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Ukelele during shelter in place. It is a nice quality beginner Ukelele. It makes pretty good sounds. Comes with the tuner. Yes because the strings are nylon, you need to tune it everytime you play. So far, i enjoyed learning how to play it.
customer_reviews.author: *QTpie*

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter to learn as she’s growing out of interest in her violin. But alas she said no. So I’ve been learning. Love it. I probably should’ve gotten a soprano. But still working at this concert sized.
customer_reviews.author: MrsIke

product_meta.title: Donner Concert Ukulele 23 Inch Mahogany Ukelele Starter Kit With Gig Bag Strap Nylon String Tuner Picks DUC-1
product_meta.description:
Size:23 InchProduct Description
The Donner DUC-1 Ukulele is a great way to take laid-back tropical atmospheres anywhere. Whether you're strumming in a hammock on the beach or kicked back in a recliner in your living room, a ukulele is a great way to spread some good vibrations. 

The Donner DUC-1 offers great sound, great play ability, and a great price. The rosewood fingerboard and mahogany body make the Donner DUC-1 a great Ukulele for beginners or four-string strumming professionals. Including everything a beginner needs to get started. 

Pick up it to join in the growing ukulele fanfare! Enjoy your own fun and colorful life.

Donner Concert Ukulele DUC-1, A Very High Quality Sounding Beautiful Looking Ukulele With All Accessories Included For FREE! Includes all these FREE accessories: 
1. A High Quality Accurate Tuner Donner DT-2, battery included; 
2. A Good Ukulele Bag; 
3. A Colored Ukulele Sized Strap; 
4. A Carbon Nylon String.

Our Awesome Customer Support, you can rest assured to buy our products.

Specifications
Size: Concert 23 inch
Body & Neck: AAA African Mahogany
Fingerboard: Indian Rosewood
Bridge: Indian Rosewood Donner unique design
Rosette: ABS
Weight: 1300g (with box)

Package included
1 x Donner DUC-1 Ukulele
1 x Ukulele Bag
1 x Ukulele Strap
1 x Carbon Nylon String
1 x Donner DT-2 Tuner
feature_bullets: Traditional Concert Ukulele with mahogany body and four advanced carbon nylon string
Mahogany body and neck bring you richer and brighter sound; Rosewood fingerboard and bridge provides a comfortable playing feel
Smooth and accurate, Donner patented chrome-plated guitar style tuners to keep your ukulele always in tune
18 Brass Frets with Fret position Marks at 5th, 7th, 10th and 12th frets on neck and top of fingerboard
Comes with ukulele bag, ukulele strap, carbon nylon string and digital clip-on tuner，4 pcs guitar picks as gifts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,488 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
